item.title: Goudont 659 V2 || DUNGEONEERING || QUESTS || TUT ISLAND|| LOYALTY TITLES
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

[quote=“scriptscape, post:79, topic:441515”]Earlier today I’ve been messing with the savegame files, it makes them corrupt.
When you login you’ll get “Error loading your profile. Please contact customer service.” message from the client.

I’ve been editing the xml files using Notepad++ in first instance and after the errors I switched to the regular notepad which comes shipped with Win 7.
Which also resulted in the same errors.

I’m still having kind of trouble getting used to these new servers, when I was active we only had 317 and 377 servers.
And some elitists were loading custom items :P[/quote]

The good old days… Anyways, go to data>savedgames>YOUR USERNAME

and delete that YOUR USERNAME file. Your username is the one you used to log in, so look for your name, and delete it. This should reset your account and you’d be able to log in.

Read full topic
item.source: Goudont 659 V2 || DUNGEONEERING || QUESTS || TUT ISLAND|| LOYALTY TITLES

item.title: Goudont 659 V2 || DUNGEONEERING || QUESTS || TUT ISLAND|| LOYALTY TITLES
item.dc:creator: @scriptscape scriptscape
item.description:
@scriptscape wrote:

Earlier today I’ve been messing with the savegame files, it makes them corrupt.
When you login you’ll get “Error loading your profile. Please contact customer service.” message from the client.

I’ve been editing the xml files using Notepad++ in first instance and after the errors I switched to the regular notepad which comes shipped with Win 7.
Which also resulted in the same errors.

I’m still having kind of trouble getting used to these new servers, when I was active we only had 317 and 377 servers.
And some elitists were loading custom items

Read full topic

item.title: Goudont 659 V2 || DUNGEONEERING || QUESTS || TUT ISLAND|| LOYALTY TITLES
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

bn1471:

I used master and its hitting maximum’s of 3 with cls, torva, fury and b ring? I also tried training, same problem

Okay so, torva is made owner only at the moment, cause like it has a huuuge ass bonus. And that’s bull… there must be something wrong with your account, cause torva is strongest shit ever in Goudont 659 so far.

I InDrEk I:

Nice, but you shouldn’t take every picture on how to join clan chat ? This is just a common sense. Just take more pictures of other features -.-

lmfaoooooooooo sorry, its just showing the proccess of the clan chat and like, propper clan chat

[quote=“cooking843, post:71, topic:441515”]ok. i just want to know one thing
how do i make my self a admin or owner or w/e[/quote][quote=“Millionaires, post:72, topic:441515”][quote author=cooking843 link=topic=544213.msg3993810#msg3993810 date=1336972533]
ok. i just want to know one thing
how do i make my self a admin or owner or w/e
[/quote]This, I’m so unfamiliar with 508+[/quote]
lmfaooooo , easy stuff. Okay so,

Go to "Data>savedgames>YOUR ACCOUNT NAME
and in the file, search for >rights
and >owner
and >main

Those makes you

  1. Main owner
  2. Owner +
  3. Admin + (The crown)

[quote=“scriptscape, post:76, topic:441515”]Thanks for the fixes guys.
I’m not sure why Netbeans uses jre6 as default, kinda lame.

EDIT:
I’m impressed, rep++ for Goudont.
Good work.

Also, do you mind if I base my new project on it?

EDIT2:
I didn’t feel like reinstalling JRE6 since I was using JRE7.
So I added constructors to the classes, and got it working now, no errors at all.
thanks Exure, so stupid I didn’t think of that from the start.[/quote]

Aha thanks, and okay yeah, what ever works for you. And thanks for rep ! Mad respects (:

Read full topic

Uree using jre6 Use jre7 or Compile with jdk6 to run with jre6.[/quote]

Thanks for the fixes guys.
I’m not sure why Netbeans uses jre6 as default, kinda lame.

EDIT:
I’m impressed, rep++ for Goudont.
Good work.

Also, do you mind if I base my new project on it?

EDIT2:
I didn’t feel like reinstalling JRE6 since I was using JRE7.
So I added constructors to the classes, and got it working now, no errors at all.
thanks Exure, so stupid I didn’t think of that from the start.

Read full topic

item.title: Goudont 659 V2 || DUNGEONEERING || QUESTS || TUT ISLAND|| LOYALTY TITLES
item.dc:creator: @Millionaires Millionaires
item.description:
@Millionaires wrote:

[quote=“bn1471, post:74, topic:441515”][quote author=goudont link=topic=544213.msg3993505#msg3993505 date=1336938273]

I’ve downloaded and i’m looking to use this as a base to practice and build on but i tried killing npc’s and its only doing damage that it would do at level 1 on all combat skills, the maximum hits im getting is 4 with maxed gear, please help? i’ve added you on msn

Yeah, once you level up, you will hit higher don’t worry . Try going to ::train and kill the crabs there, it’ll be faster.
[/quote]

I used master and its hitting maximum’s of 3 with cls, torva, fury and b ring? I also tried training, same problem[/quote]How did you make yourself owner?

Read full topic
